source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ITEM_NUMBER]
      ,[DESCRIPTION]
      ,COALESCE('',[DESCRIPTION_ESA]) as [DESCRIPTION_ESA]
      ,[ORANIZATION_CODE]
      ,[TEMPLATE_NAME]
      ,[LIST_PRICE_PER_UNIT]
      ,[UOM_CODE]
	    ,COALESCE('',[WEIGHT_UOM_CODE]) as [WEIGHT_UOM_CODE]
         ,COALESCE('',[UNIT_WEIGHT]) as [UNIT_WEIGHT]
       ,COALESCE('',[VOLUME_UOM_CODE]) as [VOLUME_UOM_CODE]
       ,COALESCE('',[UNIT_VOLUME]) as [UNIT_VOLUME]
        ,COALESCE('',[MIN_MINMAX_QUANTITY]) as [MIN_MINMAX_QUANTITY]
       ,COALESCE('',[MAX_MINMAX_QUANTITY]) as [MAX_MINMAX_QUANTITY]
       ,COALESCE('',[FULL_LEAD_TIME]) as [FULL_LEAD_TIME]
    ,COALESCE('',[FIXED_LOT_MULTIPLIER]) as [FIXED_LOT_MULTIPLIER]
      ,COALESCE('',[FIXED_ORDER_QUANTITY]) as [FIXED_ORDER_QUANTITY]
           ,COALESCE('',[MINIMUM_ORDER_QUANTITY]) as [MINIMUM_ORDER_QUANTITY]
       ,COALESCE('',[MAXIMUM_ORDER_QUANTITY]) as [MAXIMUM_ORDER_QUANTITY]
            ,COALESCE('',[LONG_DESCRIPTION]) as [LONG_DESCRIPTION]
			,COALESCE('',[ITEM_INV_APPLICATION]) as [ITEM_INV_APPLICATION]
      	,COALESCE('',[TRANSACTION_CONDITION_CODE]) as [TRANSACTION_CONDITION_CODE]
     	,COALESCE('',[ADJUSTMENT_ACCOUNT]) as [ADJUSTMENT_ACCOUNT]
   ,COALESCE('',[CORRECTION_ACCOUNT]) as [CORRECTION_ACCOUNT]
      ,COALESCE('',[SALES_COST_ACCOUNT]) as [SALES_COST_ACCOUNT]
      ,COALESCE('',[FOUR_DIGIT_CODE]) as [FOUR_DIGIT_CODE]
        ,COALESCE('',[ORG_NAME]) as [ORG_NAME]
        ,COALESCE('',[PE_EXT_ATTRIBUTE1]) as [PE_EXT_ATTRIBUTE1] 
           ,COALESCE('',[PE_EXT_ATTRIBUTE2]) as [PE_EXT_ATTRIBUTE2] 
     
  FROM [inventory].[Parts_Item_Header]
